name: Air Combat Strike - Tactical Top Gun Force
name_original: Air Combat Strike - Tactical Top Gun Force
description:
Air Combat Strike - Tactical Top Gun Force Edition puts you in the cockpit of some of the worlds greatest fighter jets!

It is your mission to destroy the enemy jets and collect coins along your way to ensure you can upgrade your jet and become the Top Gun of the air force world!

Featuring;

~ Gorgeous Graphics!

~ 4 Different Amazing Fighter Jets To Choose!

~ Game Center Enabled!

~ Fast & Fluid Game Play!

~ Auto Firing Option!

~ Universal App (iPhone,iPad)!

So climb aboard, it's time to feel that need for speed!
